channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 09:37 Threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further updates.
item.description: 游릭 09:37 Threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further updates. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 09:32 Alarm lifted in Khmelnytskyi region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 09:32 Alarm lifted in Khmelnytskyi region. Follow further messages. #Khmelnytskyi_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 09:22 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community
item.description: 游리 09:22 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community#Kharkivska_oblast' This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 08:30 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 08:30 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling.
